query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_entries,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'correct' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as correct_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'incorrect' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as incorrect_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'unanswered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as unanswered_count
FROM question_progress qp
JOIN questions q ON qp.questionId = q.id
JOIN topics t ON q.topicId = t.id
WHERE qp.userId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'testyou@me.com')
  AND t.courseId = 2;

  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'correct' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as correct_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'incorrect' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as incorrect_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'unanswered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as unanswered_count
FROM question_progress qp
JOIN questions q ON qp.questionId = q.id
JOIN topics t ON q.topicId = t.id
WHERE qp.userId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'testyou@me.com')
  AND t.courseId = 2;
